attributes.action: bring back young farmers (YFC) annual general meeting (AGM)
attributes.additional_details: The convention also brings in a lot to the local town we all depart on as well as the money thats raised by clubs for charity on there way there. It would be such a shame to see the end of this after 50 years of the AGM
attributes.background: National YF are trying to cancel are AGM this would be a great shame for the organisation as it would be the start of the demise of the federation. This is the last chance before harvest starts for young people to get together and blow off a bit of steam as well as taking part in competitions.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept your petition because this is a decision for the National Federation of Young Farmers' Clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to contact them here:

http://www.nfyfc.org.uk/contact
